Posts.Content: ncheatum wrote: I just found out that I have two different types of breast cancer in the same breast. It was caught early and the masses are small but, because of the location of the masses I can't have a lumpectomy as I had hoped for. Does anyone have advice for the pro's and con's of having only the breast with the cancer removed or both?Â  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: One breast or both? ncheatum new2bc
